clinic.name: ToothFairy Dental Clinic
clinic.address: Shanti Dazzle, 607, near Agrawal Public School, Scheme No 140, Indore, Madhya Pradesh
clinic.hours:
Monday to Friday: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM
Saturday: 9:00 AM - 2:00 PM
Sunday: Closed
Emergency: 24/7 (Call ahead)

policies.appointment_info: Appointments recommended but walk-ins accepted based on availability
policies.arrival_time: Please arrive 15 minutes before your scheduled time
policies.cancellation: Cancellations must be made 24 hours in advance
policies.payment_methods: Cash, Credit/Debit Cards, UPI, Insurance accepted
policies.insurance: Cashless facility available for major insurance providers
policies.what_to_bring: Previous dental records and X-rays, Insurance card (if applicable), Photo ID proof, List of current medications
